txt.en: Easterlings prepare to lay siege to Dale and the Lonely Mountain. The bells of Dale must be rung to signal the inhabitants to retreat into Erebor.
Defeated Tabî-kohin without allowing any of the bells of Dale to fall
Defeat Tabî-kohin without allowing any of the bells of Dale to fall
Do not allow any of the bells to fall before Tabî-kohin has been defeated.
